title: This assignment tests you to how to take files inputs from command prompt.

questionText.text:
Given a CSV file and your task is to read the file and implement the following methods:
String getRow(int rowNumber) : returns string in the given row number.
Int getRowCount() : returns the number of rows in the csv file.
Input : Reader.csv
date,l_ipn,r_asn,f
2006-07-01,0,701,1
2006-07-01,0,714,1
2006-07-01,0,1239,1
2006-07-01,0,1680,1
2006-07-01,0,2514,1
2006-07-01,0,3320,1
2006-07-01,0,3561,13
2006-07-01,0,4134,3
2006-07-01,0,5617,2
2006-07-01,0,6478,1
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
